Even the (i) _________ and alluring charms of Paris were not sufficient to cure the young expatriate of his yearning for the simple and quaint charms of his rural American home.
Blank (i)
(A) lascivious
(B) sophisticated
(C) foreign
(D) alien
(E) alienating
